summary: This is an email chain between Assistant United States Attorneys discussing scheduling a meeting to discuss a forfeiture question related to a property in the Jeffrey Epstein case. The correspondence shows coordination among prosecutors in the Southern District of New York regarding asset forfeiture proceedings.

persons.name: Ted
persons.context: Mentioned as being available to discuss a forfeiture question related to the Jeffrey Epstein case along with another prosecutor.

events.title: Forfeiture Discussion Scheduling
events.description: Prosecutors coordinate to schedule a meeting to discuss a forfeiture question regarding a property in the Jeffrey Epstein case.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Prosecutors in the Southern District of New York were actively discussing asset forfeiture related to Jeffrey Epstein's properties in June 2019.
The email chain shows coordination between Assistant United States Attorneys regarding legal strategy in the Epstein case.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal proceedings regarding Epstein's assets at the time.
The document reveals prosecutorial activity related to property forfeiture in the Epstein investigation.
